notes.text:
Incident 2026-02-27: Forge migration for #91 wiped telos.db, then backup cron ran after and backed up empty test data. Two fixes needed:
1. Any DB migration must take a timestamped backup to Drive BEFORE running destructive DDL
2. Backup cron must detect if node count drops dramatically (>50%) and refuse to overwrite — treat as anomaly, alert instead
Implement both. The snapshot-to-git recovery path worked this time but was brittle.

notes.text: Notary appointment (task #39) marked complete. Registration requires: 1) Confirm notary appointment date/time 2) Gather all documents (Gesellschaftsvertrag, etc. from task #40) 3) Attend appointment 4) Notary files with Handelsregister 5) Obtain registration confirmation. Awaiting Andreas to confirm notary appointment booking and schedule registration meeting.

ideas.title: OpenClaw SaaS offering
ideas.description: Cloud-hosted version of OpenClaw for teams that don't want to self-host.
ideas.rationale: Reduces friction for new users; recurring revenue model.
ideas.key_decisions: Pricing: per-seat 9/mo; multi-tenant with data isolation

ideas.title: Atlas memory persistence via vector DB
ideas.description: Replace flat MEMORY.md with a vector store for semantic recall across sessions.
ideas.rationale: Better long-term context; enables fuzzy search over past decisions.
ideas.key_decisions: Which vector DB (Qdrant, Chroma, pgvector?); cost vs self-hosted

ideas.title: Telos mobile app
ideas.description: Native mobile app for Telos goal tracking.
ideas.rationale: Considered but web dashboard is sufficient for current use case.
ideas.key_decisions: Rejected — too much effort, web is fine
